episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1101_0100: Lear had the idea to host a fashion week on Pasio.
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1101_0200:
But he was struggling to decide what should
be featured.
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_0400: Young master, if I may... I have a suggestion.
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_0600:
With fashion, no matter the look, the key is the
person wearing it. The body is important!
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_0700:
Therefore, I think those with the best-trained
bodies should be featured!
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_0800:
But then the main feature would be muscles,
not fashion, would it not?
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_0900:
Although, as you said, the relationship between
fashion and the body can’t be ignored.
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_1000:
Well, Sawyer. Can you pitch your idea to
everyone and get them on board?
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_1100:
Some people may object, so you may have to
battle them, but...
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_1200: Yes, sir! Leave it to me!
episode_event_fashionweek/4001_1001_1300: Heh, good response! Now then, be on your way!
episode_event_fashionweek/4002_1001_0100: So that’s the situation. What do you think?
episode_event_fashionweek/4002_1001_0200: I agree, a trained body is beautiful...
episode_event_fashionweek/4002_1001_0400: You gotta train to look good in sportswear!
episode_event_fashionweek/4002_1001_0600: Thank you! I’ll be counting on you all!
episode_event_fashionweek/6801_1001_0100:
Oh my gosh! Excuse me! I’m a member of the
Gordie fan club!
episode_event_fashionweek/6801_1001_0200: Could you sign my photo book later, please?!
episode_event_fashionweek/6801_1001_0300: Of course. Thanks for your support!
episode_event_fashionweek/6801_1001_0400:
My fourth photo book will be coming soon. I’ll let
you know when it’s finished.
episode_event_fashionweek/6802_1031_0100:
I can’t go without my
glasses when I’m reading.
episode_event_fashionweek/6802_1001_0100:
I had a chance to read your research
paper, Colress.
episode_event_fashionweek/6802_1001_0200:
Oh, thank you! I hope it’ll help you reach
new heights as an Elite Four member!
episode_event_fashionweek/6802_1001_0300:
If you can produce some results, that’d be
enough to prove my theory!
episode_event_fashionweek/6802_1001_0400:
*chuckle* I could tell from your writings you’re an
interesting character...
episode_event_fashionweek/6803_1031_0100:
Your real face is
something you’d want to
keep hidden.
episode_event_fashionweek/6803_1001_0100:
It’s hard to change the design of something you put
on your face all the time.
episode_event_fashionweek/6803_1001_0200: I-I have a lot of the same masks, too...
episode_event_fashionweek/6803_1001_0300:
Unlike shoes and clothes, masks can completely
change how you come across.
episode_event_fashionweek/6803_1001_0400:
On the other hand, if we wear a mask, then
even if we show our true face, we may not
be recognized.
episode_event_fashionweek/6804_1001_0100: Where did you get your jacket, Alder?
episode_event_fashionweek/6804_1001_0200: I’ve been thinking about it ever since I last saw it!
episode_event_fashionweek/6804_1001_0300: There goes Lance with his cape obsession.
episode_event_fashionweek/6804_1001_0400:
I could tell you...but that’d take away the fun of
figuring it out.
episode_event_fashionweek/6804_1001_0500: C’mon, don’t be like that. You’ve gotta tell me!
episode_event_fashionweek/6805_1001_0100:
I feel like a lot of people from Sinnoh keep their
necks bundled up!
episode_event_fashionweek/6805_1001_0200:
Now that you mention it, Cynthia and Barry do,
too, don’t they.
episode_event_fashionweek/6805_1001_0300:
Sinnoh has a lot of cold places, like
Snowpoint City.
episode_event_fashionweek/6805_1001_0400:
Take good care of your scarves so you don’t get
cold, you two.
episode_event_fashionweek/6806_1001_0100:
At least once in my life, I’d like to go to Johto.
Valerie has a strong connection to it.
episode_event_fashionweek/6806_1001_0200: Ahh, I’m so jealous you two are from Johto!
episode_event_fashionweek/6806_1001_0300:
You get to see people walking around town in
beautiful furisode whenever you want.
episode_event_fashionweek/6806_1001_0400:
Umm...that might be how people think of Johto,
but it’s not like that at all.
episode_event_fashionweek/6806_1001_0500:
The only people I’ve seen wearing clothes like
kimono all the time are Falkner and the
Kimono Girls...
